title: Mastery Rewards ?
body: So guys with the new champion mastery i was thinking wouldn't it be cool if you got a summoner icon for every champion you get to mastery 5. Like say you main a champion mine is {{champion:254}}  you get their mastery to 5 then unlock a summoner icon or am is this a terrible idea ?

replies.body: Riot wouldn't do that I reckon. So far they have really small amount of features that offer pure aesthetics for free. Skins and Summoner Icons are the only two things that are somewhat customisable, and even then they aren't really customisable.
